field.label: Page Main
field.comment: Set the width of the main page [in px or %].
field.tooltip: Set the width of the main page [in px or %] - This should be set to 100%, all below elements refer to this value. If you set it to a different value, keep in mind that all the values below, expressed in %, will refer to this value and not to 100%.

field.label: Page Main Padding
field.comment: Set custom padding around the main page [in px]. Example: 0 15px
field.tooltip: Set custom padding around the main page [in px] - You can set the padding for each side of the page (top, right, bottom, and left).

field.label: Footer
field.comment: Set the width of the footer [in px or %] - Example: 1400px, 90%, 100%. For full width use 100%

field.label: Row
field.comment: Set the width of row [in px or %]. You can set the width of the '.row' class from this value. Example: 1440px
field.tooltip: set the width of row [in px or %]. You can set the width of the '.row' class from this value. When you use the '.row' class in any page in your store it will use the width defined here.

field.label: Default Page
field.comment: Set width of the default page set [in px or %]. Default store pages are pages like: Checkout Page, Cart Page, Login Page, and other magento default pages. Example: 100%
field.tooltip: Set width of the default page set [in px or %] - default store pages are pages like: Checkout Page, Cart Page, Login Page, and other magento default pages. You can set a custom width for all default pages.

field.label: Cms Page
field.comment: Set width of the CMS pages [in px or %]. This sets width of CMS pages in your store, for example Homepage or other CMS pages. Example: 100%
field.tooltip: Set width of the CMS pages [in px or %]. This sets width of CMS pages in your store, for example Homepage or other CMS pages. For example you may want to use full width for your Homepage and 1400px for Category Page / Product Page.

field.label: Category Page
field.comment: Set width of the Category Page [in px or %] - Example: 1400px or 90%, for full width use 100%.

field.label: Product Page
field.comment: Set width of the Product Page [in px or %] - Example: 1400px or 90%, for full width use 100%.
